name: Mutant Run 3D
description:
Do you want to have the speed of a cheetah?
Do you want to have the power of an elephant?
Do you want to have the wings of a falcon?
Welcom to Mutant Run! Come on, do your best to choose the right mutation to win this epic competition. When you are running on a track full of various obstacles, you need to choose to go through the mutation gate to evolve your body, gain the talents of specific animals, and clear the obstacles in the road!
Everything depends on accurately mastering the characteristics of animals and adapting to the environment, so that you are in a leading position in the game! You will find that each level has a series of new and extraordinary obstacles that you need to overcome, so you will never get bored or want to quit the challenge in Mutant Run!
